sentences: Isetus on kõige olulisem osa protsessist.
Töötajad peavad isetama oma töid korralikult.
context: The word 'istet' appears to be the imperative form of the Estonian verb 'isetada', which means 'to set', 'establish', or 'to fix in place'. It's a command telling someone to set, establish, or arrange something. This is the third person singular imperative form used when addressing one person informally.
